com.mattrader.common

Class StockCom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mattrader.common.StockCom

  • public class StockCom
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collect data about the stock of a ticker.

    An instance of this class is not immutable.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String ticker,
            double avgPrice,
            long qtyPort,
            long qtyDir,
            long qtyNeg,
            double gain,
            java.lang.String timestamp)
        Update data within the stock.
        Parameters:
        ticker - - name of the ticker
        avgPrice - - average price at which the transactions took place
        qtyPort - - quantity of stocks in portfolio
        qtyDir - - quantity of stocks owned by Directa
        qtyNeg - - quantity of stocks in negotiation
        gain - - gain/loss
        timestamp - - timestamp at which data are sampled
